name: YALC
author: Taako
description: 📝 Yet Another Logging Cog (YALC)! Logs all the spicy server events with style and fun! 🎉
install_msg: Thanks for installing YALC! Use `[p]help YALC` to get started.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores log channel and event settings per guild. No personal user data is stored.
